  Ã‚Â²              ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸   ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸ ÃƒÅ¸   ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸              Ã‚Â²

  
  In the year 2299, an interstellar war rages on. In a bid to save Earth 
  from destruction, you must take control of the Strike Suit - a 
  revolutionary fighter craft with the ability to transform into a 
  lethal suit of space armor. 

  The Director's Cut is the definitive version of the game featuring 
  a next-gen graphical overhaul, completely new re-recorded voices, a 
  restructured campaign and additional content - including the 
  Heroes of the Fleet campaign.

System Requirements:


S: Windows 7 (SP1) or Windows 8 (Please note that we only support 64 bit OSs.) 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Graphics: DirectX 11 graphics card with 1 GB Video RAM - Nvidia Geforce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5770 
DirectX: Version 11 
Hard Drive: 5 GB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
